categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, a battle was fought in the factory-deserts of the Mid Rim planet Phorsa Gedd between the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry, under the command of Captain Micha Evon, and the Galactic Empire. Shortly before the Battle of Hoth, Hazram Namir, who remembered the battle vividly, reminisced the battle with his fellow rebels Roja and Beak. Future chief engineer Vifra joined the company before they left the world.
The battle of Phorsa Gedd was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
